name: Assembik's Ruquired
description:
How quickly can you solve the puzzle? Race against the clock to make sure all the parts are in the right place!

Controls can be re-mapped in the pause menu by clicking on the control you wish to change.

- Mouse: Hover over part, hold left mouse button to select and drag, release left mouse button to place or drop. 

- WASD: Rotate the cube so you can see all faces.

- Q/E: Rotate the part clockwise/counter-clockwise to get accurate placements.

Goal:

Put the cube back together as fast as you can. You can either put the cube back chaos style and put the faces wherever your artistic vision takes you, or you can put them back in a nice orderly way.

However you choose to go about your journey, I'd love to see what times people get! I'll update this comment with the current best times over the next week. 

Chaos mode: (could be you) 10:00.00

Order mode: (could be you) 10:00.00

Credits: 

- Absolute bangers! INS/OVR

- Everything else: velopman

- Special thanks to all those that tested the game during development and gave me feedback along the way.
